info.name: privacyIDEA Two Factor Authentication
info.summary: Enterprise grade two factor authentication with different token types.
info.description:
Plugin to forward authentication requests to your own privacyIDEA Authentication System installation. privacyIDEA can manage many different kind of authentication devices. Thus you can assign different authentication objects to your users as second factor. Users can now authenticate against your ownCloud installation with Google Authenticator, Yubikey, key fob, OTP display cards and much more.
**Note: You need a privacyIDEA authentication server in your network to manage all authentication devices of the users centrally.**
